parameters.name: FaceVar
parameters.description: Array of faces to delete from the sheet (surface) body

title: IModeler.IDeleteFacesFromSheetBody
description: Deletes the unused faces of the sheet body.
signature:
System.Boolean IDeleteFacesFromSheetBody( 
   System.Int32
Count
,
   ref Face2
FaceVar
)

parameters.name: FaceVar
parameters.description: Array of faces to delete from the sheet (surface) body

returns: True if all of the faces are deleted, false if not
remarks:
Use this method to remove the unused faces from the sheet body created by
IModeler::CreateBrepBody3
and
IModeler::ICreateBrepBody3
.
